data.message: So i disabled my iphone , my old facebook was set up through my phone number . I forgot my password and lost my entire fb and my sons baby pictures are on there please help I've already tried the help center

replies.message: Hi Melanin. You may be able to get back into the Facebook account you are currently unable to access by answering a security question, using an alternate email address listed on your account or getting help from friends. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2dQsLv2 -Joe
